name: Snake Seeker
description: Sin descripción

name: Hologram
description: Hologram is a sokoban type game with holograms.

name: Yume Nikki Space
description: Madotsuki has dreamed so hard that she explored every corner of the dream world countless times... until Masada took Mado to a new space... a YUME NIKKI SPACE.

name: Angel Wings
description:
Explore the quiet dreams of Ame, a young girl unwilling to leave her bedroom.
A Yume Nikki fangame developed in six weeks for Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Smash Drums: Le Frickin’ Rock Show!
description: Sin descripción

name: Hidden Cats: Pirates
description: Dive into the enchanting world of "Cats & Seek - Pirates" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

name: Sleep Simulator
description: Sleep Simulator is a cozy real-time strategy game in which you sleep.

name: Candy & Toys Store Simulator
description: Run your own candy and toys store. Place online orders for supplies, receive them via delivery truck, stock shelves, set prices, take payments, expand, and design your store. Hiring staff and dealing with shoplifters are upcoming.

name: Unkillable Robots
description: UNKILLABLE ROBOTS is an exciting game set in the distant future, where robots have taken over the whole world and are divided into two camps. Some robots strive to restore order and peace, while others crave destruction and chaos.

name: K-One
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape From Castle Frankenstein
description: Escape from Castle Frankenstein is a thrilling platformer game where you play as Frankenstein's monster, a creation desperate to flee the dark halls of Dr. Frankenstein's ominous castle. Will you outsmart Dr. Frankenstein and gain your freedom, or will you be trapped within these walls forever?

name: Times Tables Games
description: Get ready to multiply the fun with Times Tables Games!

name: Project Cube
description: Project CUBE - Its a game that forces you to replay the level to learn more. The game gets increasinly harder after level. Can you fight all the enemies and finish the levels?

name: Cursed Labyrinth Redux
description: Incomparable deck building new type hack & slash card battle game is reborn!

name: Manga RPG
description: An original story embedded with manga, comic books, video games, and pop culture! Discover manga RGP adventure through the visual novel format with plenty of humor and hilarious references. Enjoy hundreds of original illustrations, accessible to all players for free.

name: Spaced Liberation
description: Spaced Liberation is a very small indie game about the liberation of a planet.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - M. Bison
description:
M. Bison is the first DLC character for the Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A man who resembles M. Bison, the leader of Shadaloo, who was believed to be dead. He has lost his memories, but has violent tendencies. He appears in locations related to Shadaloo, guided by Psycho Power.

name: Shadowed Descent
description: A series of inexplicable events spread throughout the village, causing chaos and disrupting the balance, leading you to find clues using all available resources to unravel the mysteries that triggered this chaos and disorder.

name: AnimalLaboratory
description: Far out in outer space, there is an experimental base where aliens use a catalyst to transform humans into animals to satisfy their needs. Here, you are a human who has escaped from a laboratory and explores the game levels while avoiding enemies.

name: The Nine Tailed Celestial Fox
description: It's a sandbox cultivation game where players recruit and train talents, build their own homesteads, practice alchemy and crafting, battle monsters, and collect materials. The combat mode features automatic side-scrolling battles with companions, meanwhile player can click cards to execute attacks.

name: Northern Song Dynasty
description: A real-time strategy game based on the history of the Northern Song Dynasty. The player can experience the fun of conquering cities, directing the country, and ultimately uniting the world through their own efforts in the simulated historical background of the game!

name: I Am Part-time Worker!!
description: This is an action-comedy game where you work part-time at a convenience store register while taking down troublesome "nuisance customers."

name: Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade
description: "City building" and "Trade" simulation game by Rota, the princess of the forest country! Rota strives to realize her plan for sea trade with the entire world. Let's greatly develop the port town of Portamare through the production, import and export of goods, and business negotiation battles!

name: Cyber Clutch: Hot Import Nights
description: Immerse in a multiplayer world where high-speed racing blends with intense vehicle combat. Choose from a variety of uniquely armed cars for strategic battles across vivid cyberpunk cities, focusing on skillful driving and deep customization.

name: Fleeting Iris: Alansya Chronicles Ren'Py Edition
description: Ayame travels to Heaven City, USA to be with her fiancée but all is not what it seems. How will Ayame's life unfold in this updated release now built in Ren'Py!

name: The Dearest Person
description: A visual novel about what it means to be human. A story about loneliness, self-identification, and the meaning of existence.

name: Cosmic Breakout
description: In this breakout-inspired game you engage in a hefty arcade battle: Move with your little board against the dark polygon-forces of the world.

name: Maintenance Crew
description: A cooperative horror game where you must work to maintain a base to keep monsters from getting in.

name: Gugong
description: Gugong is a board game with hand management and influence as its core mechanisms. The gift cards you offer as a player have to be of a higher value than the one you receive, forcing you to make strategic choices regarding which actions you want to take each turn.

name: CubeOS
description: Logic turn-based puzzle game, you play as a high-tech cube

name: Error 259
description: Fight your way through a large variety of rooms, enemies, and bosses. Collect items each floor, becoming stronger and more overpowered the further you go. Experience both funny and terrifyingly powerful synergies with over 80+ unique items and 7 playable characters.

name: Homesickness
description: A ship falls to a strange planet during an interplanetary voyage, and no one survives except the captain. The captain, faced with a damaged ship, must find a way to repair it on the planet and escape the planet.

name: Catacomb Rogue Clawsaders
description: Welcome to Catacomb Rogue Clawsaders! In this deckbuilding roguelite you'll embark on an dark journey alongside a fearless band of kitties as they claw their way through hordes of monstrous adversaries lurking within the corridors of a strange catacomb.

name: UFO Sightings Simulator
description: UFO Sightings Simulator is a survival mystery game about shooting photos of paranormal phenomena. Take photos, sell them and buy rations, tools, decorations and more, while discovering the island(s)!

name: Astrosphere
description: In Astrosphere, a sci-fi strategy game, you explore mysterious star systems and expand your space station. Master strategic challenges in space, collect resources, and navigate through uncharted galaxies as you survive on your interstellar adventure.

name: Cozy Escapes
description: Experience the uncanny adventure of Cozy Escapes, where the cozy merges seamlessly with mystery in a thrilling cooperative escape. Ready for a puzzle-packed journey with your partner, fueled by the shared desire to escape reality for a cozy moment?

name: 4D Games
description: 4D Shapes, 4D Chess and 4D Mazes!? Take a deep dive into the world of Four Dimensions, with more control than ever before!

name: Everspell
description: Everspell is an RPG game with a twist. It features card-based strategic combat in the open world hexagonal environment.

name: Poor Man's Adventure: Narco Sub Simulator
description: Join a small community of rejects, try to survive in hospitable world of peak capitalism. As a modern pirate you will scavenge wrecks of rich peoples' yachts for resources, grow weed and manage automated factories.

name: Summer Clover
description: Experience a summer like never before as you become a live-in housekeeper for three charming sisters (and your supportive supervisor).

name: Simple Trains
description: A game about building an efficient railroad network to keep all the commuters happy.

name: Sundermead
description:
Sundermead is a procedurally generated, open-world RPG in which the Anglo-Saxon gods have sent you to the Island of "Sundermead" to create a settlement. The gods have tasked you with farming and, over time, inviting more people to join you in your settlement. It takes inspiration from the two popular games, Minecraft and Stardew Valley.

Each new villager you invite to your settlement will bring something new, allowing you to unlock more items, trade with the outside world and form relationships!

But there is more to Sundermead than just your newly founded settlement. Below the ground lurks creatures beyond your imagination.

name: Undeadly
description: Direct a group of survivors in a turn-based strategy survival game. Use survivor abilities, scavenge for resources, all while navigating a warped reality strewn with inexplicable phenomena. Come nightfall, undead seek the living. Can you survive, Undeadly?

name: Street Uni X
description: Classic EXTREME sports at their best: on ONE WHEEL! Perform unicycle stunts and combos with style, smash goals, unlock new levels, characters, cheats, and more! REAL uni pros, REAL uni tricks, REAL underground jams, and REAL retro play that begs for one more run!

name: Aoi Tori
description: Shiratori Ritsu, the sole male at Kirihara Academy for Girls and its priest, protects the school from demons but finds his sanity tested by the arrival of a new student, the one-hundred-year-old vampire Mary Harker, and a call from the devil, questioning his purpose in life.

name: Broke Protocol
description: Become the Most Successful (or Most Wanted) man in the city. Broke Protocol is like a low-poly GTA Online with a strong focus on roleplaying features. You define your own goals and identity in a persistent, interactive, and reactive online sandbox. Currently in Early Access.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Deadly Toys Set
description: The Deadly Toys Set DLC brings you a trio of playful yet potent plastic-themed weapons. Features: Plastic Overseer, Plastic Instigator, Plastic Storm.

name: Overwatch 2: Pink Mercy Skin
description: Celebrate 100 million players and champion a heroic cause with the return of Pink Mercy!

name: Overwatch 2: Rose Gold Mercy Bundle
description: Celebrate 100 million players and champion a heroic cause with the Rose Gold Mercy Bundle!

name: Lords & Villeins: The Great Houses
description: Expand Lords and Villeins beyond your settlement and live out the fantasy of building a Great House: purchase land titles, deploy families, engage in trade with your neighbors, and grow your wealth and influence through diplomacy or war. A new era of prosperity is here!

name: Kairos'Light: Vanilla
description: Yo! relive Kairos'Light Vanilla, our first project, only uglier and less fun! Chat with poorly-dialogued inhabitants, then return to the current version. New successes have been added, even if they're not guaranteed to work. Have a great adventure!

name: Biological Incident
description: Cases of disappearances have become more frequent in the small town. The tracks lead to an empty house on the outskirts of the city...

name: Hero's Adventure: The Great Conquest
description: DLC "The Great Conquest" is based on Hero's Adventure: Road to Passion, focusing on sect management gameplay which is quite different from while not affecting the original game. If you are interested in a strategic game mode and are willing to treat our team a cup of coffee, please give it a try.

name: Bot Beats
description: Unleash your inner coder, build epic robots, and conquer the arena. For beginners and computer scientists alike! Join Bot Beats today and embark on an educational adventure that transforms coding from a daunting task into an enjoyable, empowering skill.

name: Mole Mine Rocks 0.15
description: Mole Mine Rocks is a clicker game where you manage a mole mining operation. Mine rocks, gather resources, upgrade your abilities, and explore levels. Hire moles for passive income, fix leaks, and interact with dynamic dialogue. Enjoy cutscenes and strategic planning to become a mine manager.

name: Syobon Action: New Something
description: There are millions of Syobon Action Alternate Universes, which are known as "Syobonverses" that are characterized by changing the appearance of the world, although they are the same plot but with few differences and one of them is New Something, the cat Syobonina has to recover her "cocaine in the form of an Artichoke" and thus not be sad, lots of memes and no sense.

name: Electrolight
description: Electrolight is a tiny game about a tiny piece of light on a tiny adventure. The goal— explore the world outside the cozy home you wake up in everyday—the computer.

name: Turret Defense King
description:
Enjoy strategic defense with high-quality graphics, and experience unique battles using various boost items and defense towers.
Destroy objects to acquire resources, and as you progress through the stages, the rewards will upgrade!

name: Wuhu Island Explorer
description: Roam around freely in Wuhu Island without any restrictions.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Sonic
description: Gotta go fast! The iconic Sonic the Hedgehog joins the party.

name: Words Across America
description: Words Across America is a word and trivia game that presents word puzzles in the form of license plates. Solve the puzzles and advance through the country collecting awards and badges. Puzzles may have multiple answers and the better answers help you climb the leader boards.

name: Squirrels Forest Race
description: Exciting arcade racing game, inspired by the classic Diddy Kong Racing, from the 90s and the graphics of Nintendo 64 games! 6 squirrels need to find the Golden Nuts and get them back. To do so, they must win the Most Fantastic Races ever seen!

name: Self-Portrait, Vomit on Concrete
description: Self-Portrait is a short interactive fiction game about a woman dealing with panic attacks and intrusive thoughts on the day after her birthday.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Sega Character Pass
description:
Includes 6 SEGA all-stars each with their own unique stats! This pack also includes 15 customization items to deck your monkey out in the freshest SEGA themed fashion trends.

The characters included are Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Axel and Beat along with outfits based on Shadow, Nights, Majima, Gilius and Akira.
Content from the SEGA Pass will be released gradually after the launch of the game and continue until March 31, 2025.

name: EA Sports UFC 5: Ultimate Edition
description: Powered by Frostbite, EA SPORTS UFC 5 is the next evolution of the fight game. From unrivalled graphics upgrades to all-new damage systems and doctor stoppages that affect gameplay in truly authentic fashion — this is as real as it gets.

name: Mystery Detective Adventure
description: Mystical events haunt locals.

name: Bou's Revenge
description: A short 3D horror inspired by Pou the famous mobile game. the game starts with you taking care of Bou but then things starts to get weird...

name: Lekker Spelen: Origins
description:
Back to the past where it all began. Lekker Spelen: Origins tells the story about a dog and a rat who wake up in a laboratory with many questions. Who are they? Where are they? Where are the scientists? And how do they escape from this laboratory?

A Lekker Spelen game with puzzles, action, co-op, and more than 10 years of references to explain to your fellow player who has never seen Lekker Spelen even though you keep linking all their videos.

name: Purple
description:
A purple puzzle game for you!

Can you make the screen purple in 50 levels?
Each level has its own logic.

name: Chili's Big Smasher BurgerTime
description: Introducing Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime, a refreshed version of the cult classic BurgerTime arcade game. Play as Joe Chilihead and build as many Big Smashers as possible and defeat evil fast food syndicate for the chance to win free burgers for LIFE!

name: One Million Checkboxes
description: An incremental browser game in which people can check and uncheck boxes on a public page.

name: Klaroro: Abyss of the Sou
description:
You're just a weak, pathetic young man who's suddenly found himself in a strange world of fantasy and mystery. What's worse, you're soon fighting off... hot mythical maidens?!

Luckily, you've got a phone that shoots hypnotic rays. Master your controls and glide gracefully through this strange world, blasting babes with your wacky weapon.

name: Generation Zero: Heavy Weapons Pack
description:
Become the Hollywood action hero that Östertörn deserves!

Grab your bandana, rip off your sleeves, and unleash mayhem on your mechanical foes with four lethal high-caliber weapons that are sure to get your adrenaline pumping.

name: Battle Factory Showdown
description:
Battle Factory Showdown is a Pokémon fan game developed in RPG Maker XP with Pokémon Essentials.
The game is entirely dedicated to the famous Battle Frontier facility "Battle Factory."
Rent a team of 4 Pokémon from over 250 available and engage in an endless series of double battles; will you be able to defeat all the bosses and set a new world record?

name: Vera Blanc Supernatural Mysteries
description: ~ Vera Blanc: Full Moon + Ghost In The Castle ~

name: Salvation Hours
description: Salvation Hours is Single player - First Person Shooter, based on the true story of Benghazi 2012 Attack on American Consulate. Play as one of the GRS Operatives in this slow paced and tactical shooter, developed by one-man development studio 'Wolf Wire Studios'.

name: Island, Sex & Survival
description: You began a new life on the mysterious deserted island after drifting there due to a shipwreck, starting from scratch. Building a base, exploring different areas of the island, living alongside various female characters you encounter, and experiencing all sorts of miraculous events.

name: Hide and Seek 2
description: Hide and Seek 2 takes the classic game to the next level with new challenges and obstacles.

name: Mazzle
description: Mazzle is a straightforward and surprisingly difficult celebration of the simple beauty of maze and jigsaw puzzles.

name: Where Are the Creatures of Mountains and Seas
description: The mythical creatures in the Classic of Mountains and Seas have all escaped. You need to analyze over a thousand characters in 12 Chinese cities, recall over a hundred mythical creatures and races, please embark on an exciting journey.

name: Run Run Boy 2
description: "Run Run Boy 2" is an exciting and adrenaline-fueled game that puts your skills and reflexes to the test.

name: The Ambush!
description: The Ambush! is an intense and exciting game of strategy and action, where players take on the role of a group of policemen rushing to defend a bank from a group of dangerous thieves.

name: Cassiculus
description: This terrifying first-person horror experience immerses the player into a world of isolation, fear, paranoia and claustrophobia as you make your way through the Oberon Cave. Throughout the game, you will experience atmospheric environments, disturbing audio and horrifying visuals.

name: Slide!
description: Slide is a Puzzle Game where you control both the protagonist and his enemy, in it you are tasked with finding ways to defeat your enemy Angry Man, be it with a sword or using the environment, every level features multiple ways to beat them and the game features over 20 of them!

name: TouchNothing
description: 3D view, first person but no person，challenge yourself，several levels，A torture game.

name: A Little to the Left: Seeing Stars
description: Seeing Stars is all about multiple solutions, with 100 stars to discover across 38 playful puzzles, and some extra cute visitors too.

name: Cozy Grove: Camp Spirit
description: As a Spirit Scout on a haunted island, you’ll once again befriend and assist an unusual assortment of troubled ghostly bears in this heartwarming sequel to Cozy Grove from Spry Fox.

name: Slide!
description: An expanded version of Slide! with additional levels.

name: Welcome to Everdell
description: Build your perfect make-believe city in the digital adaptation of the beloved family-friendly board game!

name: Sarah's Adventure: Time Travel
description: This game unearths the essence of adventure by combining elements of exploration and puzzle-solving. The game’s appeal lies in its interactive gameplay mechanics, where your choices dictate the progression of the story.

name: Vojna
description: A soldier searches for documents in a desolate zone at night. Suddenly, a voice on the radio, claiming to be a fallen enemy, warns that any negotiation error could awaken evil forces in the forest.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Secrets of the Machine God
description:
Warhammer 40,000: Darktide releases its next update on June 25, 2024, on PC and Xbox Series X|S. This new update features (but is not limited to):

New Mission: explore a derelict Mechanicus research station in Atelium Foundryplex Omega V.
New Weapons: introducing the iconic Bolt Pistol, Ogryn’s first two-handed weapons, the Pickaxes, Shockmauls and a new double-barrelled Shotgun.

name: Boats N' Hoes
description: Boats N' Hoes is a combat game based around using boats as a player and hoes as a weapon type. Attack other boats with hoes and avoid their hoes to become the best at Boats N' Hoes.

name: Nyo-Nin-Jima: My New Life in Charge of a Tropical Island
description: The censored Steam release of the Japanese romance-adventure VN from hit developer PacoPaco Soft! Stepping ashore a remote southern island, the protagonist’s battered spirits are soothed by the lovely Kowakame family that takes him in. However, many more unexpected surprises await him on the island...

name: Waiting for Instructions Run
description: Speed and accuracy are key! The "Waiting for Instructions RUN" is a RUN game in which you must use your typing skills to avoid obstacles. Use your typing skills to lead the human waiting for instructions to the goal in a situation where one fingertip can change his fate!

name: Topac Battle
description: Topac Battle is a cozy and relaxing idle game. Buy Topacs and Level them up, trade for a higher rarity, and become the master of the chill battle scene. Customize your Park as you progress from a simple park to your dream setup with rare exotic monster and ultra-rare color variants!

name: Hive Dive
description: A roguelite on-rails shooter where you pilot a remote-controlled drone into hordes of a vast, everchanging swarm of alien bugs. Shoot down enemies and fly through colourful hives to take down the queen of the swarm.

name: A Witch's Game
description: Seeking solace from the hunt of the blasphemed, a witch has made a game of tarot cards. She uses the intentions of her enemies against themselves, redirecting opposing attacks to work in her favor instead.

name: Survivors
description: Break through the siege and welcome the dawn of victory! Eight skills, twelve maps, three hundred talents, top-down survival Roguelike game! Through repeated battles, the character becomes stronger and more fearless, surrounded by monsters.

name: Neon Rider Classic
description: Race your bike through cybernetic landscapes, switch your color to navigate between glowing neon tracks and perform crazy flips in Neon Rider Classic. With upgraded graphics, this nostalgic collection Includes Neon Rider and Neon Rider World.

name: Nekokami: The Human Restoration Project
description: Start a relaxing world-building adventure with Nekokami! Architect beautiful, peaceful worlds in a far-future where Cats rule the universe. Befriend wonderous yet whimsical spirits of nature. Manage Humans. With Cats in charge, what could POSSIBLY go wrong?

name: Cafe Rosa
description: Cafe Rosa is a cafe management simulator. Serve food to unique customers and earn coins. Manage your own cafe by upgrading the facilities and changing the interior. Dive into the world of cafe ownership and watch your business flourish!

name: Aeris
description: Complete challenges or fly freely all around the world!

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble - Digital Deluxe Edition includes the base game, Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble, and the SEGA Character Pass which adds 6 SEGA all-stars to play as each with their own unique stats! Along with 15 customization items to deck your monkey out in the freshest SEGA themed fashion trends.

The DLC characters included are Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, Amy, Axel and Beat along with outfits based on Shadow, Nights, Majima, Gilius and Akira.
Content from the SEGA Pass will be released gradually after the launch of the game and continue until March 31, 2025.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble
description: Join AiAi and friends in Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble, where you and up to 16 players can compete online across multiple game modes as you aim to become Top Banana! You can also work together with your favorite bunch in 4 player cooperative mode, or slip into a wonderfully crafted story in the all-new Adventure Mode experience!

name: Real Anime Situation! 2
description: When chronic daydreamer Tooru’s dastardly diary is discovered, classmates old and new won’t give him a moment’s peace! Featuring eye-popping art, intricate animations, and multiple moonstruck heroines, this censored Steam release of the ’20 Moe Game Awards-winning comedy VN also received its own hit anime adaptation.

name: Z speed Arcade
description: Z speed Arcade, The retro endless driving game inspired by early 90s racing game but combination with modern graphic which give higher resolution. Avoid the traffic, escape the cop, collect the boost and boost yourself into another car!!!

name: Beyond Good & Evil: 20th Anniversary Edition
description: Swoop into the marvelous world of Hillys as action-reporter Jade to investigate the mysterious DomZ alien attacks alongside colorful characters, like her adoptive uncle Pey’j or the valiant Double H. Embark on this epic adventure in up to 4K, 60 fps with improved graphics, controls, and audio, along with brand-new autosave and cross-save features. Enjoy exclusive new rewards as you explore the planet and discover more about Jade’s past in a new treasure hunt throughout Hillys. Put your skills to the test thanks to the new speedrun mode and updated achievements, and learn more about the game’s development and secrets in the anniversary gallery! Armed with her daï-jo and faithful camera, Jade’s adventure will get you to freely explore Hillys, combat creatures large and small, infiltrate dangerous areas, solve enigmatic puzzles, play addictive mini-games, race the best hovercraft pilots, and take pictures of the whole experience.

name: Emberward
description: Emberward is a unique tower defense game that focuses on maze building and interesting tower mechanics. Construct mazes with blocks of different shapes and set up defense towers on them to withstand the onslaught of monsters!

name: Aleph
description: Aleph is a cube that stores human information and anthropomorphic images, starting from the space station and eventually arriving at the ruins of the dilapidated city, looking for the cube scattered everywhere and digging up the information in it...

name: Frogun Encore
description: Frogun Encore is a dashing standalone expansion/sequel to indie hit Frogun! Join now older Renata and Jake in a trek around the whole world to prevent the return of Beelzebub. Encore builds on Frogun's retro PS1/N64 formula. Plus, enjoy the whole adventure in true couch co-op.

name: Ghostboy
description: Would you return from death to help your loved ones through grief? Make fate turning decisions, micromanage the family’s relationships and defeat the negative thoughts on tower defense levels. Watch out, your job will be harder the more severe their mental disorder is.

name: Riven
description: The 1997 Riven: The Sequel to Myst title remade from the ground-up. The remake of Riven features a fully traversable 3D space in both Standard First-Person or in VR.

name: City Bus Manager
description: Build your own bus depot from scratch and create your personal bus routes in City Bus Manager. Play your own home town or any famous city in the world with real map data. Buy buses, maintain them, take care of your staff and lead your bus company to become the #1 in town!

name: Crossedland
description: If you've always loved building villages, farming, and taking care of villagers but wished there was more action and exploration, Crossedland is the home for you!

name: Signs of Birth
description: Signs of Birth is currently a distance running game with minimalistic gimmics and roguelite elements. All you can do is trial to run on a bridge to reach final goal and get as many items as possible for the reincarnation(next play).

name: Cookie Run: Tower of Adventures
description:
Enjoy exploring every corner of the Pancake Tower with friends in a 3D Cookie action adventure! Work together to defeat challenging bosses!

CookieRun: Tower of Adventures - A Cookie-crisp, Top-down Adventure!
The seal on the oven has broken.
Join GingerBrave and his friends on their epic journey to save the Pancake Tower from evil!

Clear stages to earn sweet equipment and join the Cookies on their adventure as they learn the secrets of what threatens the peace inside the magical tower!

name: My Museum : Treasure Hunter
description:
My Museum is a educational FPV simulator designed for fans of renovation, management and history buffs! You can find astounding renovation mechanics, enhanced economy and loads of historical facts!
In the game, you enter the role of the owner, art enthusiast, restorer of antiques, but also a businessman.
Your first task will be to restore the museum that you inherited from your grandfather, return it to glory and compete for the admiration of critics and visitors!

name: Wonderland Online
description: Wonderland Online is an MMO where players are tasked with surviving a shipwreck for an extended amount of time.

name: Until Then
description:
Mark, an average irresponsible high school student, tries to get by and find purpose in a humdrum life of scrolling, cramming, and traffic. He meets friends, both old and new, and embarks upon a seemingly never-ending trouble, until nothing is ever the same again.

Until Then is a contemporary adventure game inspired by the Philippines, its lifestyle, and culture. Featuring a smartphone where mechanics of modern living come into play, chat with your classmates and explore the depths of social networks, where your replies and interactions may pose consequences.

name: Sprout Valley: Summer Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mars Lives!!
description: This game is specially designed for parents and children to enjoy a shared gaming experience. It contains several mini-games that will captivate the whole family.

name: Do You Really Want To Know 2: Before Love
description:
Before Love

A text adventure game co-created by Gamtropy and the Taiwan AIDS Society - LOVE the VOICE.

"Do You Really Want to Know 2: Before Love" is a role-playing game that simulates social media interactions. This game is a prequel to the previous game "Do You Really Want to Know?" and it tells the story from the perspective of the character "Nick."

A sudden change disrupts what was once a peaceful life. Adapt to the situation, try to find your footing, and embrace who you are. But can family, friends, and lovers accept the new Nick?

Post updates, send messages, make choices. If you reveal your true self, can you still maintain the relationships you want?

description: You have five days to earn the contract to be the Junior Office Assistant for Insert Name Here Inc. Completing tasks each day, sounds simple enough but can you do it against the clock? Tasks will challenge memory, reaction time and coordination.

name: 12 Hours Museum
description: 12 Hours Museum” is a 3D exploration adventure game. The goal of the game is to find 45 anomalies in order to escape from the museum using a pocket watch. Once you find an anomaly, you can view and re-experience it. Collecting all endings and performing certain operations will open an extra mode.
