name: Egg Fried Rice
description:
It's the middle of the night. You need to rest but your stomach is growling and
it's all you can think about. You're never going to fall asleep like this, you can't
fight it. Is there any food in the house? Something quick? Something easy?
Perhaps you will have to visit the local takeaway and order some EGG FRIED RICE...

name: Grazers
description: Protect herds of grazers by hunting them.

name: Mini Reaper
description: Mini Reaper is a short indie chaser-horror 3D platformer themed after retro game creepypasta and game emulation. The gameplay revolves around collecting souls in a mansion while avoiding the chasing monster.

name: Odeio Sonhar
description:
A Yume Nikki Fangame for Dream Diary Jam 8.

Play as Ivy, a young adult who comes to grapple with their own identity and family as they engross themselves in the world of a TV Show, simply titled, "Frank Show." Learn about yourself, change your body, and come to grips with the things that lay in the recess of your mind.

name: DeathJack
description: Play Blackjack where the wager is your life. Do you have what it takes to beat the host? Let's find out...

name: Anzu Castle Gracula
description: Castlevania-style platformer

name: Doodle Hunt: Search Hidden Items
description: Doodle Hunt is a delightful seek-and-find game set in hand-drawn cityscapes. Explore charming maps, locate hidden items, and watch them come to life in color! An enchanting adventure for all ages.

name: Voxelgram: DLC #1
description: An animal themed DLC pack for Voxelgram with 82 puzzles and 6 dioramas.

name: Potion Quest
description:
A puzzle game where the player must complete recipes by knocking potions into the recipe area as they drop from above.

You have limited time so must act fast and get the recipes completed.

name: Cazzarion: Ship Hunting
description: Sin descripción

name: Pandoland
description: A new mobile game developed by Game Freak in collaboration with WonderPlanet

name: Sunshine In WoozaVille!
description: Inspired by old internet cartoons, you take on the role of "The New Guy" in 'Sunshine in Woozaville!' You'll hang out with Ian and his buddies, exploring Woozaville's colorful world. Sometimes, you'll be right in the middle of the action, making choices that steer the story.

name: Sweet Office 2
description: Sweet Office 2 - is a simple and beautiful jigsaw puzzle game with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photo in the gallery.

name: La Salamanca
description: "La Salamanca" is an inmersive first-person psychological horror experience, a story-driven game where you traverse different sections, solve puzzles, and survive the horrors lurking in the shadows of a twisted apartment complex. Inspired by an Argentine local urban legend.

name: ZombCube
description: ZombCube is a first-person, cross-platform, zombie survival, wave based game. Play solo or with friends all over the world destroying the evil ZombCube's. Use teamwork, leadership, and skills to be the best and rank on the leaderboards.

name: Tehnodrom
description: "Tehnodrom" offers exciting gameplay, a variety of enemies and weapons, and the ability to make strategic decisions that affect the course of the game. The game is intended for fans of casual games in the 2D platform style who love challenges and want to test themselves as a brave tehnodrom pilot.

name: Figure Adventure
description: "Figure Adventure" is a trendy game with the theme of hand-made figures, which integrates card cultivation and placement and hang-up gameplay!

name: GameLib
description: GameLib is an application that brings together several 3D multiplayer mini-games, such as Werewolves Online, Ludo, Connect 4 (4 in a row). GameLib features an in-app voice chat function, so you can communicate with other players during the game.

name: Jigs4w3D: My Photos DLC
description: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy the immersive 3D environments and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. How would that feel solving puzzles generated by your own photos? Search no further and try it now in the My Photos DLC.

name: Jigs4w3D: Futuristic Apartment Environment DLC
description: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy this immersive 3D environment and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. How would that feel solving puzzles far from the noise of a bustling city? Try it now in the Futuristic Apartment Environment DLC.

name: Jigs4w3D: Loft Office Environment DLC
description: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy this immersive 3D environment and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. How would that feel solving puzzles at work after all your colleagues went home? Try it now in the Loft Office Environment DLC.

name: Jigs4w3D: Puzzle Challenge
description: Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy the immersive 3D environments and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. Choose from different categories and solve all 20 puzzles on 5 difficulty settings for completely free or grab your favourite DLC.

name: Dash n Cry
description: DASH n CRY is a fast-paced, challenging 2D Precision Platformer game for those who want to put their skills to their limits. Jump and dash your way through a young astronaut's training routine inside his spaceship.

name: Alpha Rooms
description: This is Alpha Rooms, "It was created to experience infinite possibilities with infinite pleasure."

name: Pop Art
description: Painting has never been easier! Just relax and enjoy! In Paint by Numbers!

name: Modern Museum
description: Moderum museum is a mysterious, horror, escape game. Only single-play supported. You should collect relics from endless rooms of museum and put them in the right display case. Be careful of monsters and guards since they are chasing you.

name: Survivor in the Forest 2
description: Survivor in the Forest 2 is a 3D puzzle adventure game with clicker elements. Meet the continuation of the first part of the adventure game. You returned home, but something strange happened.

name: ReThink 5
description: ReThink 5 is a Puzzle Game in a peaceful futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors to create challenging problems to solve.

name: Dungeon World
description: Dungeon World mixes roguelike and sandbox elements while keeping simple gameplay and retro style. Explore procedural worlds, plan your journey, make a family, modify the lands, get old and reincarnate with more world knowledge.

name: Space Trail Fireworks
description: Drag trails, make explosions, survive as long as you can! Space Trail Fireworks is a fun arcade-like, snake-like that is easy to learn. Best on touchscreen or with mouse.

name: Speed Run
description: Speed Run is a first person platform video game, each level is full of traps, obstacles and fatal falls that you must avoid at all costs. Each level has its unique theme with different music and environments. The objective of the game is that you can complete the levels as quickly as possible!

name: Alex the Ball
description: Alex has turned into a ball after an experiment went wrong. As he navigates Nova Station, things become even more complicated when he finds himself in a parallel universe. A physics-based 3D platformer that can be completed in one go, if you don't fall, die, or quit.

name: Diatomic
description: Diatomic is the movement shooter with gun juggling, epic boss fights, hardcore parkour and more blood and chaos than the term "fantasy violence" should probably allow for! Kill - Steal weapon - kill again!

name: Defence of the Arcane Realms
description: A 3D tower defender where you must strategically use a combination of magical powers, traps, and towers in order to defend your castle against hordes of orcs, undead, and other unsavory sorts.

name: Fightin' Words
description: "Psh, just another game on Steam?" Them's Fightin' Words!! No really, this is Fightin' Words, the world's first word game auto-battler. Play words strategically, carefully choose upgrades, and send your words off to fight. Your words are your Warriors!

name: Kunkun Terror Express
description: You're trapped aboard the endless loop of the Kunkun Terror Express. observe your surroundings and search for items.it's your only hope of escape! But beware: Kunkun might be right behind you! A meme horror game by the creators of 'Exit Kun', inspired 'Exit 8'.

name: Grub Truck
description: Grub Truck is a food truck simulation game where you cook up mouthwatering meals, strategise enticing menus, set the perfect prices, complete quests and decorate your trucks with style. Invest your earnings wisely to upgrade your fleet as you build, cook, and conquer the culinary scene!

name: Silly Billy
description: A co-op horror survival game, where you explore an open-world town set in the Wild West, find and upgrade weapons and vehicles, and use them to beat an evil clown monster named Silly Billy.

name: Ashes
description: This horror game inspired by Chinese folklore offers an enthralling journey through the depths of the Underworld. As you delve deeper, you'll unravel hidden secrets veiled in the darkness.

name: Carbón Heart
description: Banished to another world, Alawn is absolutely alone in a new world that he does not know at the mercy of this one... or so it should have been if he had not stumbled upon her. Opening up this world and maybe something more.

name: Anchored Hearts: A Tale of Destiny
description: A pirate on the run, La Belladonna must escape imprisonment and prove her innocence in this roguelite adventure-meets-romance novel! Navigate wild waters, fight enemy ships, and decide to whom you’ll give your heart. Through narrative choices, unravel the truth behind your cursed fate!

name: KunKun's Dream of Horror
description: I know you saw him think of an old friend. Yes, you are already trapped in Kunkuns dream. You need to find a way to escape and avoid these ghosts and animals with your trapped companions. Some ghosts and animals like to play basketball worship chickens, dislike watermelons, and even come and show me

name: Hexis
description: Hexagons attack from all directions! Redirect them to form lines and make them vanish. How high can you score before they pile up too high?

name: The Dungeon: Dungeon Awaits
description: Dungeon-Dungeon is a turn-based, loot-heavy fantasy roguelike dungeon crawler. Each step forward is a dance to avoid checkmate. Every monster and weapon has a unique shape, similar to a chess piece. Make the right moves, create a unique build, and conquer the Dungeon-Dungeon!

name: Pomberito
description: Survive 5 nights in the heart of northeastern Argentina as a local farmer. Discover the multiple endings and reveal the truth behind the haunting tales of the Pombero in a world where folklore meets terror.

name: Southfield
description: Weird farming meets silly physics in Southfield! Combine chaotic crops with unpredictable effects, build your dream farmstead, and experiment with playful machinery. Wobble your way around an ever-changing island solo or with up to three friends and unearth its secrets.

name: BadDool
description: Baddool is a rhythm based card battler. Explore a dungeon with fun and exciting characters and foes. Build a deck of cards by exploring a dungeon and use your cards to kill enemies and gain more exciting cards! Make friends by helping them out or challenge them to a DOOL to kill them for their loot.

name: Dice & Fold
description: A turn-based dungeon crawler where your only way of attacking the enemy is by rolling dice. Roll dice to damage enemy cards to FOLD. Inspired by classic Solitaire, in a top-down table and enemies made out of cards, try to beat the dungeon with 20 unique classes. Build your deck, kill monsters.

name: Lost Pixel
description: Prepare to embark on an extraordinary journey like no other in Lost Pixel. You won't be stepping into the shoes of a traditional hero – instead, you'll take on the role of a lone, wandering pixel in a digital realm.

name: Cosmic Cursor
description: Cosmic Cursor is an arcade roguelike that combines kinetic melee-based combat with a dynamic bullet hell. Use the cursor to control a vast array of ships and survive increasingly complex enemy swarms as you battle through the cosmos.

name: Unread Messages
description: Unread Messages is a retro-inspired cyberpunk puzzle game where you deliver texts by making connections between cell towers. Alongside your Ai companion, FASMA, solve confounding levels and uncover the secrets hidden within Simullect Inc's computers.

name: Victoria 3: Sphere of Influence
description: In a more civilized age, the pen is supposed to be mightier than the sword. The first major expansion for Victoria 3 increases the depth and immersion of the diplomatic game. Build Power Blocs to protect regional interests, invest in foreign economies and interfere in your subjects' politics.

name: One Deck Galaxy
description: Roll your dice and cleverly use them to build up your civilization from its humble homeworld, growing to create a Federation spanning countless star systems.

name: Vivitter for Nintendo Switch
description: Who's the Chicken?! Introducing a party game that measures your fear level! Online battles for up to 10 players! More than 30 mini-games to test your courage!

name: Wooden Battles: Spec Ops
description: Wooden Battles: Spec Ops is a stealth action strategy game. Take control of a group of 4 special forces units with unique abilities, infiltrate the enemy base and complete the mission objectives. Use the in-game level editor to create your own missions and upload them to the Steam Workshop.

name: Final Stardust: Cosmic Nexus
description: Choose your element and awaken your elemental abilities! Build your deck, create bonds with many Elementalists and engage in fast-paced battles against AI! Enjoy the Final Stardust universe with an amazing single player experience, all in stunning 2D anime like graphics!

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Mission Pack 079
description: The classic tank battle game re-opens, guarding your base and defeating all enemy tanks. This DLC contains chapters 466-470.

name: Rocky Mayhem
description: Rocky Mayhem is a hardcore space shooter where you play as a pilot, receiving distress calls outside of Neptune from a fellow co-worker. Your mission is to retrieve him but it's not as easy as it seems...

name: Trial of Destiny
description: Trial Of Destiny is a fusion of action+rpg+rogue-like+card game. Build your ultimate deck through your journey and win the Trial Of Destiny!

name: Hero's Story
description: Hero's Story is first person action indie game with RPG elements. Action takes place in immense world of Teandria - ancient kingdom with many mysteries and wonders. You are young mercenary who got into trouble...

name: Horror Manor
description: Step into the decaying halls of Horror Manor, an abandoned estate shrouded in mystery. With a sudden click, the doors slam shut, trapping you within its chilling embrace.

name: Beyond the Room
description: Beyond the Room is the eight game by Dark Dome. In this point-and-click game, you will explore an abandoned building and unravel its mysteries.

name: Bupcraft Mod
description: Sin descripción

name: My Lovely Daughter: ReBorn
description: Just like your homunculi, we’re breathing new life into My Lovely Daughter! Featuring brand new artwork and support for 4K resolution, this gothic fantasy is darker than ever!

name: Only Up: Skibidi
description: Only Up: Skibidi is an exciting multiplayer 3D platformer. Overcome challenging obstacles and climb higher and higher. Attention and focus will help you reach new heights, and this rule applies both in the game and in life.

name: Bad Cat Good Dog Alien Force
description: Bad Cat Good Dog Alien Force is an Arcade Space Wave Defense Shooter. As the forward line, take defense against dimensional invaders and blast your way through waves of incoming enemies. Upgrade your abilities and blast more effectively!

name: Pintaris
description: Pintaris is a multiplayer competitive puzzle game that you can draw different blocks with various paint tool to clear lines and get scores.

name: Goomba BreakOut
description: Sin descripción

name: Ouroboros
description: Ouroboros is a puzzle game about making a snake bite its tail. It features 50 levels that can be played in any order and unlimited undos so there is no penalty for experimentation.

name: Pizzapocalypse
description: Pizzapocalypse is a cartoony 3D platformer where pizza is key to your movement. Dash, Bounce and Stomp your way to your loyal customers!

name: Byflvgvr
description: Armed with one of those Electric Fly Zappers, Protect your delicious food from nasty and hungry bugs. Survive long enough and kill enough bugs to move onto the next level. Your bug zapper uses a LOT of ELECTRICITY; so be sure to pick up lighting bolts to recharge your zapper.

name: Janko
description: Explore Janko's a popular restaurant established in the 80's that mysteriously closed down in the 2010's. You will have to run and hide or fight the danger that lies beneath.

name: Muksha Space
description: A spiritual yoga game that focuses on self-dialogue and emotional experiences. In the space of meditation, players are encouraged to engage in dialogue with their inner selves, contemplate the meaning of life, and understand the true essence of liberation and redemption.

name: Book of Spells 2
description: Book of Spells 2 is a continuation of the first part of the adventure game. This time an even more dangerous adventure awaits you, in which new enemies and locations await you! Monsters have crept into your world from the depths and only you can stop them! Grab your staff and go on an adventure!

name: AI Fightclub
description: Create the world's strongest AI by customizing appearance, attack method, attack timing, and other factors

name: Kado Hunter
description: As you are stranded in Vanada, you're meeting the sisters Aya and Chiyo. After you get to know what is happening, you decide to help them. In your journey as KADO HUNTER you will collect KADOS, fight against monsters, solve quests and get ready to explore Vanada.

name: DeMonkey
description: This is a GTAG fan game where you can (so far) talk to your friends! but it's not always just talking... But also to play infection!

name: Grass Cutting Simulator: Lawn Mooving Care
description: Craft the perfect lawn, become the ultimate lawn care pro!

name: Cryptic Escape
description: Monsters are taking hard earned dwarven treasure, and the dwarves have had enough. You are chosen are their champion, and are sent into the dungeons to recover your treasure, problem is... No one taught you how to fight the monsters, so your best option is to sneak by, and hope they don't catch you.

name: Sakura And The Airyvixen
description: Sakura and the Airyvixen is an anime-inspired rougelite with cute girls and strategy to spare! Cultivate an adorable team of fighters, then lead them through challenging gauntlets to ultimate victory!

name: Uncover the Smoking Gun
description: "Uncover the Smoking Gun" places you in the heart of a thrilling urban investigation where true detective work awaits. As a seasoned detective, your primary challenge lies in real-time chat interactions with various suspects. This adventure-puzzle game excels in its dynamic dialogue system, where every conversation can shift the course of your investigation. Gathering clues and persuading suspects to unveil the truth requires sharp intuition and cunning strategy. The game also features compelling confession mechanics, demanding players to navigate conversations to extract vital admissions skillfully. "Uncover the Smoking Gun" combines an intricate narrative with immersive environments, promising a gaming experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat as you hunt down the truth.

name: Fortnite Reload
description: Fortnite Reload is a 40-player fast-paced Battle Royale game that is all about carrying the squad to Victory. Reboot as long as one teammate is still in the action! Loot up after rebooting to get back into fighting shape! Eliminate opponents to reboot teammates faster! Near the end of the match, reboots will stop. Lock in with your squad to secure the Victory Royale!

name: Punch!
description: Punch! is a clicker Game, in which you click fruit to make a proper glass of Punch! In Punch! you click fruit to gain even more Punch!

name: Meowstro
description: You are a cat with a piano and synthesizer made just for you! Meowstro is designed to be a versatile MIDI interface, allowing you to play using MIDI inputs and outputs. Humans can also interact with it using a standard PC keyboard.

name: Legend Pirates
description: Legend Pirates is an online pirate MMORPG, where the seas are your playground. Sail, battle, and craft your legend in an immersive world. Join us on an epic voyage!

name: SuperHyperHappyGame
description: [3D first person runner game]Run through aiming for the goal!

name: Sex Inspector
description: Sex Inspector is a 18+ visual novel where every sultry alley and shadowy figure could lead to thrilling encounters or chilling discoveries. Think you can handle the heat?

name: Chrono-Shift
description: Solve captivating time travel puzzles. Fight enemies with action-packed movement based combat. Explore a vividly rendered dystopian metropolis. Experience classic, action-packed platformer gameplay.

name: StickmanQuiz
description: "StickmanQuiz" is a game where players control a stick figure to tackle two-choice quizzes. With three modes and nine challenges, players can test their knowledge across various quizzes. They can also compete against 100 NPC rivals. Aim to clear all challenges!

name: Site Z-374
description: An expanded version of ExaByt's Quake Brutalist Jam 2 map and now using Alkaline.

name: Mondo Reico
description: Sin descripción

name: Disorder: Save Your Family
description:
Ensnared in a sinister game of life and death, a young gamer must solve a series of chilling word puzzles to rescue his family from the clutches of The Ghoul—a malevolent and infamous dark web content creator.

With each puzzle solved, the grip of terror tightens; each failure broadcasts the family's plight to an audience of miscreants on the dark web, escalating the stakes in a relentless battle against time and terror.

As players progress, they navigate a twisted narrative where their choices shape the fate of an innocent family, adding layers of suspense and moral dilemma to their harrowing journey.

name: Guess The Object
description: Sin descripción

name: Nehonobasa
description:
This is a bullet hell shooter. It might be hard.
Defeat all 4 stages + the final boss.
Shoot bombs with the X key. Shooting a bomb into a bomb
will increase the attack range and wipe out all bullets and enemies on the screen.
Also, if you have at least one bomb
even if you get hit, you won't miss because it will be an auto bomb.

name: Sealed
description: Sealed is a horror game that will immerse you in a disturbing and mysterious experience. You will find yourself trapped in a haunted hospital, where every shadow and every whisper will remind you that you are not alone.

name: Rô + Fire Race + Scrap Bolts + Milk Seller + Home Sweet Home + Rafa's World
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R: Hunter Scope - Tactical Arsenal
description: Sin descripción

name: Frozen Honey ASMR: Sleek Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Defense: Pew Pew Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: LivingForest
description: From a first or third person perspective, living this forest.

name: BFDI: Branches
description: BFDI: Branches is an all-new platformer game with Firey, Leafy, Coiny, and Pin! Featuring multiple characters with varied gameplay, a story mode with branching paths, a complete level editor, and an online level browser!

name: Spring Time
description: Bikes, springs and racing!

name: Supermarket Simulation Grocery Empire 3D
description: Get ready to step into the shoes of a supermarket manager !

name: Naus
description: NAUS is a thrilling 2D action roguelike that takes you deep into a dark dungeon for deadly battles against hordes of monsters and exciting adventures. Explore dark corridors and caves, where every step can be a challenge.

name: Heart Clicker
description: Heart Clicker is a free-to-play clicker/idle game where you start with nothing and build your way up to a vast collection of hearts! Click to generate hearts, invest them in powerful upgrades, and watch your heart count soar.

name: Bananametr
description: Bananametr is a clicker game where you click on a banana! In Bananametr, you click on a banana to get a bigger banana and compare it with a friend's banana!!

name: Dark the Dead
description: Dark the Dead is an exciting game where you take on the role of a hidden wanderer who goes to meet an elder to receive a new task. The elder's magic coins were stolen, and your main goal is to return them.
Embark on a journey of Zen riddles in a Buddhist mandala space. Reach Nirvana with a 1 in 8192 chance in a mystical world adorned with tombstones and Buddha statues.

name: The Mythical City 3
description: Two sides, two crystals

name: Greedy Snake
description: Snake escape from Garden of Eden

name: Undead Onslaught
description: "Undead Onslaught" is a Bullet Heaven RPG where you ascend as the villain. Master unique mechanics and strategic combat to dominate a dark, evolving world.

name: BallBastic!: Ultimate Pack
description: For more casual players that want the experience of playing the game without fear of failure, the Ultimate Pack enables Freeplay mode, which gives you infinite lives. Also, you get a cool Eyeball cosmetic ball, so that's always a plus!

name: Silhouettes
description: You see them in your dreams, only you can solve the riddle. Immerse yourself in crime, fantasy, horror events.

name: Diorama Builder: Medieval Castle
description: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the diorama "MEDIEVAL CASTLE", which will allow you to assemble a complete Medieval Castle, with a royal bedroom, weapons room, prison, main hall, kitchen and everything with lots of details, such as armor, cannons, crossbows and more!

name: Daydam Knight
description: Daydam Knight is a roguelike deckbuilder game. You play as a knight who is trying to destroy demons that have attacked his land. Use your Powerful cards and destroy all the enemies.

name: Diorama Builder: Noir City
description: This expansion of DIORAMA BUILDER brings the diorama "NOIR CITY", which will allow you to set up a central area of a city in NOIR style, representing the architectural style of the 1940s and 1950s.

name: Lingjing
description: Lingjing is a fantasy themed single player game developed based on Unreal Engine 5 with an open world 3D realistic art style. The game is currently under development and only open for testing applications. In the beta version, we only offer some content for players to experience.

name: Let's Go! My Harem Farm
description: This game is a farm life simulation game. Players will control this young man, growing vegetables, raising livestock, and after work, go out to the village to get along with the women. As you get closer, events that deepen the relationship occur, and eventually, they may wish to have your children.

name: Super Anthony's Joltzsi
description: Manage falling tetrominoes with an innovative top down perspective and layering mechanic in this all new action puzzle game that combines elements of Tetris, 1010 and Sudoku in one!

name: Beat Hazard 3
description: Are you ready to explore your music collection mapped as a stunning galaxy of wonders? Experience your music collection as never before with this intense music driven twin stick shooter. Each of your songs will have its own unique ebb and flow based on the music.

name: Diorama Builder
description: The pleasure of assembling, admiring, and interacting with your own Dioramas collection, without ever losing a piece.

name: Gladiator Guild Manager
description: Gladiator Guild Manager is a game about building your guild, buying, developing and equipping units, figuring out tactics in different arenas against various opponents and becoming the most powerful gladiator guild in this epic fantasy world.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Ultra Legendary
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Blades: HD Upgrade
description: The all new X-Blades HD Upgrade features updated graphics and wide-screen compatibility, as well as newly rendered and post processed cutscenes in Full HD.

name: Bounty of One: Panic in the Mines
description: The Undertaker has escaped through the Mines! Face the danger of the abandonned tunnels, beware of landslides and goblin-driven minecarts and bring the necromancer to justice. 3 new characters, 30 new objects, 17 new achievement, get ready to rumble!

name: Cage: Story of Lust
description: The story of the love of a fallen angel with a beloved angel. You have to make him love you and make this world colorful again!!

name: The Ghost of Us
description: The Ghost of Us is the first and only book of The Ghost of Us series.

name: Crazy World of Caleb: Level 1 to 7
description: Experience the start of Caleb's difficult journey. For more get Crazy World of Caleb.

name: Fast Running
description: Fast running, challenge the limits.

name: Senile Zombies
description: Senile Zombies is a magic-themed zombie survival shooter that can be played alone or in co-operative multiplayer. Shoot your way through multiple rounds of increasingly strong enemies, while upgrading your own powers to keep up.

name: Oil and Sand
description: An exciting tower defense game where you have to defend your island from the invasion of enemy forces. Your task is to build and upgrade towers to repel waves of attacking enemies.

name: Delta Strike
description: Gear up, soldier, and prepare for the ultimate FPS showdown in Delta Strike!

name: The Hauntings: Surveillance
description: Monitor haunted locations for anomalies as a technician for a secret government agency. Use various camera modes to collect evidence and identify ghosts. Uncover the truth and prevent public panic in this realistic horror spot-the-difference game.

name: Egregore
description: Embark on a first-person adventure to a mysterious café in Cairo. Adopt a new perspective and shape reality to your will as you unravel an occult conspiracy hidden in plain sight.

name: Ngolf: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: One Night: Burlesque - GOTY Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Garten of Banban Bundle: 1 + 2
description: Start your adventure with Garten of Banban the right way with this elegant bundle containing Garten of Banban & Garten of Banban 2! Dive right in and you're sure to make some friends!

name: Garten of Banban Bundle: 3 + 4
description: Continue your Garten of Banban journey with this elegant bundle containing Garten of Banban 3 & Garten of Banban 4! Dive deeper into the facility! Will you find your missing child?

name: Garten of Banban Bundle: 1 + 2 + 3 + 4
description: Start your journey with Garten of Banban the proper way with this comprehensive bundle containing Garten of Banban 1, 2, 3 & 4! Dive right in and you're sure to make some friends!

name: Aery: Time Traveller Bundle
description:
This bundle features the games of the Aery - Calm Mind series. These ganes are an interactive game experiences that are designed to relax your mind and soul while following an exciting story.
You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.
Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying. It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.
Of course, you can always select the level that you feel helps most to relax yourself. Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don't have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.
This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.

name: Behind The Mask Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Torture Jam 1
description: The God of flesh and desire has such sights to show you. But in order to be granted that privilege, he demands tribute in form of good suffering. He has graciously given Map-Center's community time to create a Strogg inspired torture maps worthy of his magnificence. Featuring seven new maps, a hub level, final boss and several intermissions.

name: Stars, Stripes and Subgames: Collector's Edition
description: Immerse yourself in a world of subgames captivating and diverse subgames!

name: Ginger Shroom Journey
description: Jump into action in this addictive platformer where your goal is to collect as many coins as you can! Harness the power of mushrooms to find your way out. But beware! Traps and monsters lurk around every corner, ready to challenge your reflexes and strategy. How far can you push yourself?

name: Wired Gambit
description: Cut wires and outsmart Smuggy in the high stakes game of Wired Gambit. Strategically use your items, manage your shields, and choose your cuts carefully to emerge victorious!

name: Midnight Myths
description: A First Person Horror game where you play as a new hired park ranger doing simple park ranger tasks and observing wild life. Some wildlife being creatures from American Folklore.

name: It's Just A Prank
description: It's Just A Prank is a first-person horror game about kids playing pranks on each other until a PRANK GOES WRONG. Experience suspense, fear and unexpected twists as a simple joke becomes a nightmare.

name: Urban Skater: Skateboard Delivery City Challenge
description: Welcome to Urban Skater - Skateboard Delivery City Challenge, an adrenaline-fueled adventure that puts you on wheels – or rather, a board – like never before! Strap on your helmet, grab your skateboard, and prepare to become the fastest (and coolest) food delivery person in town. Race against time, weave through bustling city streets, and deliver piping hot meals to hungry customers in this fast-paced and exhilarating experience.

name: Supermarket Owner Simulator: Business
description: Welcome to Supermarket Owner Simulator: Business, the ultimate supermarket management experience! Step into the shoes of a budding supermarket manager and embark on an exciting journey to build and manage your supermarket empire. Your adventure begins with the opportunity to design and customize your supermarket from the ground up. From choosing the perfect layout to picking the products that will fly off the shelves, every decision you make will shape the success of your store.

name: Glowface
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man World 2
description: A full GBC conversion for Mega Man World 2 by SpecialAgentApe, with an included soundtrack hack by forple.

name: Happy Sawland
description: Embark on a journey to reach the far lands of «Happy Sawland». Go forth, the seeker of «Happy Sawland». No hesitation before the many challenges you are to come across! Jump and dodge until the goal is reached!

name: Commando
description: Commando is a multi-player third-person shooter with a fun, toony, style; a class and team based dynamic; powerful and varied abilities and equipment; and an array of vehicles. Choose your class, choose your loadout, go to battle and fight for control of objectives to win the war!

name: MagnetWorks
description: A puzzle game using magnets. A table puzzle to be solved by using the pulling and repelling forces of magnetism. Place the magnetic pieces and guide them to the goal point.

name: Brendon's Water Polo
description: Where we celebrate the action-packed Water Polo sport, hitting a yellow ball back and forth until one player manages to get past their opponent. First to seven points wins!

name: Detective AnnIntae: Missing Basketball Court
description: Solve the disappearance of the basketball court with Detective Ann Intae of JooJoo City!

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 9
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Pedro Temple
description: An action arcade platformer!

name: Lewd Hentai Puzzle
description: A classic puzzle game to lift your spirits. And five beautiful girls will keep you company!

name: Beauties! They're All After Me
description: In this thrilling romance game, players are a working-class hero meeting six girls: a loli, a mature woman, a housewife, a soft girl, a domineering CEO, and a cute, naive girl. As he gets involved with them, he awakens a cheating system—can you believe it?! Make your final choice now!

name: Bug darake no Machi
description: Sin descripción

name: Click on piña coladas together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ piña coladas in this panoramic level?

name: Meow Path
description: A puzzle game in which you have to figure out how to draw a path across the entire board. To lead the cat to its favorite toy

name: Cute Dogs Slide
description: Cute Dogs Slide is a fun game where you rearrange tiles to complete adorable dog pictures. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts, it challenges your skills and offers a delightful experience with each cute dog image you solve. Ideal for all ages!

name: Survivor
description: A retro 80's arcade-style top-down zombie shooter where you upgrade weapons, collect loot, and battle through increasing waves of undead and challenging bosses.

name: Pogo Stick Champion
description: Bounce with your pogo stick to new lands!

name: Love Elysium: Secret of the Goddess
description: Fall in love… with a goddess?! In this visual novel divinely beautiful girls will steal your heart!

name: Frog Jumper
description: Jump into our latest game and guide a lively frog across a pond. Test your timing and skill as you hop from lily pad to lily pad. Play now and discover how high you can soar!

name: One Night With Kawaii
description: Run and hide! Find a way out before she catches you.

name: Temple of Lily
description: In the ancient Temple of Lily a powerful Necromancer has risen from the shadows, seeking to destroy the sacred land. Defend the temple from the evil forces of the Necromancer. Build towers infused with the pure energy of Lily to fend off the relentless waves of undead creatures.

name: Speedway Turbo: Car Racing Challenge
description: Feel the adrenaline surge as you tear through the circuits, rev up your engines and take on the challenges!

name: Super Hero I.T. Software
description: You are the I.T. Department's lowest paid security grunt, and a hacker is malware-bombing the company network. Your shift ends in an hour. The break room coffee pot is cold. Log in, 'cause it's gonna be a long night.

name: Rune Stones
description: Rune Stones - An exciting 3D logic puzzle! A mysterious and enigmatic island opens before you, filled with puzzles that you have to solve!

name: AtooB
description: This is a game where you move 5 boxes. Move it from the first point to the next point, and then back to the first point. That's just the game.

name: Heaven Seeker: The Savior of This Cruel World
description: "Heaven Seeker: The Savior of This Cruel World" is a twin-stick rogue-lite shooter where you take your own shot at the castle in the sky! A dungeon with a different structure each time you enter, a variety of magic bullets - and a formidable barrage of bullets - await you.

name: Cracker
description: Cracker is a fast-paced arcade game where you have to destroy as many blocks as possible before you run out of lives.

name: Memo Blox
description: Memo Blox is a casual game that challenges your attention and memory. The game features a good minimalistic style and great music. Can you become a Master of Memo Blox?

name: Legend of the Master Baiter
description: A fun and unique fishing RPG anybody can enjoy! Beings known as fishgirls show themselves before only a select few worthy fishermen. Fish inhabiting lakes, rivers, and the sea take on bold new forms! Try to collect them all!

name: Crop Crusade
description: Explore and fight together with your fruit troops in this RTS meets 3D platformer adventure. The game features multiple ways to beat every level while guaranteeing a short but focused experience.

name: Abandoned Hut
description: Explore scary places in this first-person horror game. Interact with characters, solve puzzles and discover that bad intentions can lead to catastrophic consequences.

name: Little Duck Adventure
description: Together with your friend, help two cute ducks through many trials. Work as a team to get the big picture. And remember, communication is the key to success.

name: Tiny Watermelon Match
description: REVERSE EVOLUTION! It's raining gigantic Watermelons! Challenge top scorers on global leaderboards

name: Mouse & Crane
description: Ideal as a child’s first game, Mouse & Crane is a single or multiplayer adventure offering creative puzzle-solving moments through cooperation, upcycling and construction.

name: Ballistic
description: An exhilarating third-person multiplayer game that redefines the classic game of dodgeball into a fast-paced party experience! Features a variety of ball buffs, maps and cosmetics.

name: Eyes of Destiny
description: Take on the role of a man who has found himself in a terrible situation in life. Collect items, explore places, solve puzzles, overcome to the goal while hiding from the evil monsters that are chasing you! Find out what's really going on.

name: A Few Days With: Rebecca
description: Embark on a sensual butterfly-hunting adventure with Rebecca, a charming young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Rebecca's enticing layers.

name: Zoey: Horny Roomates
description: Share this fantastic room with Zoey, the hottest girl around! She's sexy, she's horny, and she's your roommate for the next few days. Zoey really loves to meet new people and have fun! Specially the sexual fun!

name: Innocent Grape
description: Humour and hentai - what could go better together than these!? Become a promiscuous Ann in this 2D visual novel. Help her realize all her crazy sexual fantasies and fulfill her dream! What could go wrong...?

name: Chadgeon: Enjoyers Edition+
description: Survive, Dominate and Create the most Chad pigeon in Chadgeon: Enjoyers Edition+

name: Sugamenia
description:
Immerse yourself in SUGAMENIA, a 2D action platformer, where you'll have to solve puzzles in an epic adventure.

Play as Violet, a fearless space explorer marooned on this unknown planet, and your powerful ally, Suichi, a flying robot that can deploy bombs, be used as a platform, offer advice in order to find hidden treasures, and many more features.

name: Lich's Dungeon
description: Lich's Dungeon is an autobattler roguelike RPG, buy and upgrade skills, find synergies and use powerful items in your quest to defeat the undying lich.

name: Kitiplant
description: Adorable cats work together to solve puzzles in Kitiplant. Guide them through challenging grid-based levels, where they must share resources and carefully manage their energy to restore life to once-dormant forests.

name: Who Murdered My Empress?
description: “Who Murdered My Empress?” is a visually stunning romance visual novel set in a fantastical realm inspired by 19th century Vietnam. Assume the role of an Empress with a lavish harem of captivating men as you navigate intrigue, love, and mystery.

name: Matsudaira's Myoshu: A Sengoku Village Simulator
description: Welcome, Myoshu, it is time to construct your village during the tumultous time of Sengoku where the legends of samurai and ninja were born. A multitude of buildings, technologies, festivals, and resources await your grand design but beware as bandits, ronin, and ninja seek to hinder your progress.

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Premium Bundle
description:
The Premium Bundle includes the following content:
- The Shadow of the Erdtree expansion
- The Shadow of the Erdtree Digital Artbook
- Original Soundtrack

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Collector's Edition
description: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree - Collector's Edition includes the Elden Ring - Shadow of the Erdtree expansion code, a 46cm statue of "Messmer the Impaler", one of the key boss characters in Shadow of the Erdtree, an art book, and a download voucher for the original soundtrack.

name: Devastating Fog
description: Devastating Fog is a top-down survival shooter roguelike game. You play as one of the few survivors, whose goal is to reclaim the Earth from the fog. Fight enemies, craft and upgrade your weapons. Discover the deserted post-apocalyptic world where everything wants you dead.

name: Perfect Chess
description: Chess Designed Specially for GAMERS! Integrated with the XZ Tutorial, which teaches you everything to play a competitive and successful game Have a LESS Boring and More Dynamic and Competitive Game Awaken the "Grand Master" in you today!

name: Survival Mission Z
description: Loot and shoot in this action-oriented adventure set in a zombie apocalypse. Acquire different guns, explore various locations and interact with other survivors on your mission towards a better future.

name: Isabella: Chasing Shadows
description: Isabella - Chasing Shadows is an erotic thriller with adult elements. Consumed, after the death of your fiancée, you’ll try to uncover the city’s darkest secrets. What connection does a ‘High Fashion’ model have to your fiancée’s death and can you protect those you care about? It’s up to you!

name: Orc Survivor
description: Orc Survivor catapults you into a harrowing world where the roar of the crowd is deafening, your adrenaline is pumping, and every step taken could be your last. Survive as an orc warrior imprisoned and thrust into the merciless Colosseum. Will you conquer or become just another forgotten casualty?

name: Asa-Chan Wants to Go Home!
description: This is a small adventure story... Asanuma Sayaka is an ordinary girl, but one day, she is suddenly transported to another world and becomes a hero. Here, she faces a tremendous challenge...

name: Urban Taxi Simulator
description: Build your own taxi empire! Hire drivers. Upgrade your taxi station!

name: Dystopika
description: Dystopika is a chill cyberpunk city-builder of dystopian dreams (or nightmares). No goals, no stress, no objectives. Just your imagination.

name: DJ Clicker: World Tour
description: This is a DJ's journey into light and sound. With the power at your fingertips to realise your dream. You can become a star.

name: The Riftbreaker: Heart of the Swamp
description: Explore an entirely new area of Galatea 37 in this Story Campaign expansion for The Riftbreaker. Catalog new species. Craft new and unique weapons. Fight hordes of aliens, unlike anything you've seen before.

name: Tarisland
description: Tarisland is a non-P2W MMORPG on PC and mobile that features raids, diverse classes and builds, and a vast world for exploration. Here, myths are real, ghosts exist, and magic is unquestioned. In this immense, open-world playground, choose from various races, each with unique skills and abilities, and embark on an epic adventure full of mystery and dangers to overcome.

name: Pet Shop Simulator
description: Run your own pet shop in Pet Shop Simulator! Find new homes for pets, thus fulfilling the dreams of your customers. Take care of the needs of animals by selling the right items and get involved in matters related to the pets' home life!

name: Times & Galaxy
description: Embark on an interplanetary adventure as the first robo reporter for the Times & Galaxy, the solar system's most trusted holopaper. You're just an intern, but if you can get the scoop, write great stories, and impress your colleagues, maybe you'll get to keep your job!

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree
description: The Shadow of the Erdtree is a fully-fledged expansion that features an all-new story set in the Land of Shadow. It adds a whole new map with 70 new weapons, ten new shields, 39 new Talismans, 14 new sorceries, 28 new incantations, 20 new Spirit Ashes, 25 New Ashes of War, 30 new armour sets, and new consumables and craftables.

name: Living With Dragons
description: Travel with your dragon companion to locate and hatch the 6 Elemental Dragons. Farm crops and raise livestock to feed your creature companions as well as crafting items to make your journey easier. Tame new creature companions and use their abilities to improve your farming and crafting.

name: Exodus Checkmate
description:
You're trapped in school and monsters appeared... The only way out? Playing real-life and mortal chess! Explore complex Gameboards in this First Person Dungeon Crawler and raise the affection with your teammates to get closer to them!

You are the king. You are the school's only salvation!

name: Noreya: The Gold Project
description: Venture into a frenetic metroidvania and take part in a fight between divinities where you will have to choose between Corrupting Gold and Purifying Light to achieve your ends.

name: In Heat: Lustful Nights
description: Diamond Straits is looking for a warm body to work at one of their prestigious resorts. Unfortunately they didn’t tell you that you would be preyed upon by a harem of thirsty Monster Girls. Will you uncover the secrets of the straits, or will you lose yourself in the bosom of luxury?

name: Fat & Furious
description: Fat & Furious is a 2D combat game about fast food parody! Choose among these obese and comic characters! And beat the sinister minister of the restauration industry!

name: Vainly
description: Vainly is a minimalist and story-driven platformer that subverts some of the common expectations from games by blending gameplay with the philosophy of Absurdism.

name: Megacopter: Blades of the Goddess
description: Pilot the Megacopter, a sentient weapon that gains power by feeding on the blood of its enemies. Play through the campaign featuring seek and destroy, boss, rescue, and defense missions against the evil reptoid army. Upgrade Megacopter with the fabled AZ-TECH: ancient weaponry and armor.

name: Astral Gunners
description: Get ready to push your skills to the limit against an endless sea of bullets and evil robots in Astral Gunners. Choose from five different gunners to master in this horizontal shooter. With the ability to dodge, reflect, delete, and convert bullets you are more powerful than you might believe.

name: Button Pop
description: Button Pop is a 3D Tower defense game fused with Button mashing chaos. Construct the deadliest defense strategies by unlocking powerful traps and turrets across a variety of terrains, while building your very own button with the rewards of your adventures!

name: Flatspace: Music Pack 2
description: 9 new in-game music tracks to enhance Flatspace. Like any in-game music for Flatspace, these will trigger at random when you enter a new sector.

name: Screw Drivers: Supporter Pack
description: If you want to support us and the development of Screw Drivers, you can purchase this Supporter Pack which includes four special materials to color your vehicles, a confetti cannon and a license plate.

name: Terra Inferno
description: Humans are ruining the lush world of Terra Inferno! Embody nature's wrath in this Turn-Based Tactics meets Resource Management Game, evoke natural calamities to devastate the human onslaught!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad - Havoc Over the Kuban Campaign
description: This campaign focuses on a fictitious, but historically plausible A-20 Boston, or "Havoc" squadron flying interdiction missions against the over-extended German supply lines.

name: Vanity: Weapon Pack
description: This DLC contains 28 weapon skins.

name: Apocalypse Secrets
description: You will have to explore the devastated world after a global catastrophe in search of various items. In this 3D arcade in genre "find and click" you need to flying across the map, you will be searching for different objects.

name: Hallway of Horrors
description: Explore a mysterious labyrinth of rooms and hallways, but be careful - for you are not alone in the Hallway of Horrors. Made with Unreal Engine 5 for Steam VR.

name: Flippee Ball
description:
A minimal, 1-button, 2-player game of maximal skill where pinball meets basketball.

Learn the shots, practice against the AI then challenge your family and friends.

A single button flips your flippers but gives you precise control of your shots. Master your timing, improve your reactions to your opponent, learn all the tricks and develop your own techniques until the ball is under your control and scoring becomes second nature.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive player, Flippee Ball offers a satisfying experience that's easy to pick up but hard to master. Download now and start your journey to becoming a Flippee Ball champion.

name: Revive of The Moon
description: Mitsuki, a high school girl, is caught up in an unprecedented disaster that comes out of nowhere. And the town is filled with deformed monsters. What is her destiny? A fusion of light action and zombie horror, A zombie action game supervised by Eiko Kano.

name: Demon Guardian
description:
Four girls and a newbie witch doctor explore their friend's haunted house. Although welcoming at first glance, the house shows its true colors when night falls...

Based on the ghosts and beliefs of Thai folklore, Demon Guardian is a visual novel with multiple endings, told from the perspective of Pim, a girl who attract spirits. She quickly drew the attention of the new transfer student, who seems to have a ton of these spirits under his control...

name: Egg Surprise
description: A fun clicker with economic simulation in the penguin kingdom. Obtain rare collections, venture into dangerous dungeons, and build your own civilization!

name: Pixel Puzzles 3: Ukiyo-e Jigsaws
description: Pixel Puzzles, the very best in the world of digital jigsaws.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Mercedes-Benz Pack
description: This Mercedes-Benz Pack features the best the German company can offer: powerful and elegant racing cars, such as the 2016 Mercedes-AMG GT3, 2019 Mercedes-Benz A-Class, 1993 Mercedes-Benz E 36 AMG Estate Custom and 1971 Mercedes-Benz 300 SEL 6.8 AMG.

name: Level Up 80
description: LEVEL UP 80 is an action game with magic and shooter mechanics, where a lone knight must level up from 1 to 80 to defeat a massive orc army. Utilize various spells and weapons to protect peaceful lands from invaders.

name: Project Phoenix
description: The player finds himself in an abandoned Soviet bunker, built at the height of the Cold War. The protagonist is a stalker, a hunter for artifacts and secrets of the past. He entered the bunker, attracted by legends of secret experiments and the mysterious disappearance of all personnel.

name: Medieval Businessman
description: Welcome to the Empty Patch of Land. Can you create your own beautiful kingdom here? In this strategy in real time you can build farms, taverns, barracks, and more.

name: Rescue Team: Clouded Mind
description: The world faces a brand-new threat as a dangerous cult spreads its influence. People begin to betray their free will and follow the cults orders, as reports flood in from various locations worldwide, it's down to the Rescue Team to save humanity once again!

name: Falco Totem Destroyer
description: A fun physics puzzle!

name: Not a Masterpıece
description: Not a Masterpiece invites players on a whimsical journey through a vibrant cartoon world, where nothing is quite as it seems

name: Lalli
description: Lalli tells the tale of a Finnish folk hero and freedom fighter. In 1240, Finland is invaded by the neighboring Swedish Kingdom, aiming to convert the tribes to Christianity by force. This is when a regular woodsman is forced to adapt into a warrior - and a legend, remembered centuries later.

name: Gachi Feasting
description: Gachi Feasting is a hardcore action puzzle game. You will have to connect wrestlers into chain using their arms and other naughty parts. Will you be able to withstand this gachi world of falling men and their mighty fists?

name: Night Driver
description: Night Driver - 3D car game in which you will drive at night through dark alleys!

name: Inventory Quest: Hero's Hoard
description: Inventory Quest: Hero's Hoard is a short and fast-paced inventory management and loadout optimization game. The player must upkeep a hero's loadout from random item drops and try to survive as long as possible to achieve a new high score.

name: Chunithm Luminous Plus
description: An expanded version of Chunithm Luminous.

name: Spooky Pixel Hero
description: A chilling homage to retro gaming – Rediscover the magic of classic games and retro platformers with a terrifying twist. SPOOKY PIXEL HORROR combines the beloved aesthetics of vintage 2D pixel games with a deeply immersive horror narrative that will keep you on edge.

name: Miracle Pool
description:
# The Premier Pool Simulator

**Real Ball Physics:** We spent 3+ years refining the most realistic billiards physics engine.

**Easy Cue Stick Handling:** Learn fast with our intuitive aim, lock and shoot mechanic.

**Mixed Reality:** Pool is best played in MR. Confidently move through your real room to line up the perfect shot.

**Game Modes:**
- Ranked Online Multiplayer
- Single Player Matches
- Private Matches with Friends
- Mini Games with Leaderboards
- Daily Challenges
- Practice Mode

Progression: Earn XP, rank up and unlock new table designs, balls, cues and more! Also improve your competitive rating with multiplayer matches.

name: Lunar Strain
description: Lunar Strain is a new Moon-themed episode megawad for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports (complevel 2) made by the various members of Doomer Boards, led by Matador. There are 22 levels plus a credits map but there are also two curiosities in the MAP31/32 slots. MAP31 is a demo map showcasing the new monsters/props. MAP32 is a color swapped version of MAP13.

name: Escape Simulator: PowerWash DLC
description: Experience a brand new escape room set in the iconic PowerWash garage! Play solo or in co-op, in VR or flat mode. Solve tricky puzzles, clean away grime for clues, and enjoy new 3D editor props with a rocking new soundtrack.

name: Warzone Chronicles: Night Vision
description: Sin descripción

name: WorldNeverland: Elnea Kingdom - Summer Sailor Uniform Set: Bowa
description: Sin descripción

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Additional Character Pack Vol.2 "Chika & Ruby & You"
description: Three characters have become playable characters and new! Adventure the mirror world with Chika, Ruby, and You!

name: Hentai Girls: Cat Cutie
description: Meet over 30 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Arcade Archives: Rastan Saga II
description: In a time when might was the only justice...

name: Clasherball
description: A WILD action puzzle game!

name: Frozen: Royal Castle
description:
The world of Disney Frozen comes to life in this fun-filled doll house game, Disney Frozen Royal Castle!
Parents can have fun with kids while playing with Anna, Elsa, Kristoff and other Frozen dolls, as they dress up, cook, and explore!
Featuring content from the beloved films, kids can customize and play in their very own royal doll house, allowing them to express their creativity and imagination.

name: Mazeing
description: In development. Well well well, what have we here? Scary maze huh? i'm really scared! So you are happened to be in a maze, you dont know where exactly, all you know there is your buddies there and a monster. For all this nightmare to end you need to find an artifact and place it on the altar.

name: Gifted: The Tombs
description: Gifted: The Tombs is a fantasy rogue-like with extraction elements. 1 player local, 1-4 players internet/LAN based multiplayer. Third person melee combat, collect items and gear on each floor to progress lower and lower.

name: 13F
description: You are a tired office worker who has been working overtime until late at night due to a heavy workload and is trapped in a strange office building. You have to get to the first floor quickly and go home to rest, because you have to go to work tomorrow morning!

name: Glen: A Dull Journey into the Unremarkable
description: This is a game for dull people with short attention spans. You can probably clock it in 10-20 minutes! You'll perform tasks like paying your bills, watching some paint drying and reading local council regulations. It's dull and relatable. Should you buy it? Well, up to you, but I appreciate you all.

name: Cosmic Parkour: Infinite Journey
description: You made an invention that has allowed you to go to any dimension you wish, when suddenly, somebody has taken that device and has used it to send you to a set of dimensions known as Cosmic Parkour. Can you escape the Cosmic Parkour?

name: Puzzle World: Funny Dogs
description: Rotate the puzzle elements and collect all the amazing funny dogs images!

name: Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up
description: Game where you guide anime-style girls through a thrilling free-running adventure.

name: Train Your Brain! Spot the Difference with Cat Photos
description:
Spot the Difference in Kitten Photos!
Enjoy brain training while being soothed by adorable cat images.

name: Toilet Hero
description: An arcade first-person shooter where you have to fight alien invaders called "Toilets"

name: Pixel World: Unity-Chan!
description: This is an action game to reclaim the lost colors of creatures.

name: Eggconsole Tritorn PC-8801
description: Tritorn, a brave warrior, stands up to restore peace to the island of Luwanda. This is an excellent action RPG that became famous in the early days of PC games!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 11 - Super Mega Ultrawatch
description: Gear up for an epic showdown as Ultrawatch faces mythic Calamity Empress Ashe, celebrate 100 million heroes with the return of Pink Mercy discover ancient mystique and modern technology in the new Runasapi map, and more!

name: Screw Drivers
description: Crazy physics and high-speed races! Craft vehicles cleverly by combining building blocks and mechanical parts to create powerful drivetrains. Unlock new parts, race for the gold, and challenge your friends in multiplayer.

name: TheExit8NYC
description:
In this first-person game, you are trapped in an endless underground passage.
Carefully observe your surroundings to reach “Exit 8”.

Do not neglect any anomaly, floor 0 is a model without any anomaly, look at all the objects carefully.

If you find any anomalies (object different from the floor 0), turn around immediately this will take you to the next floor.

If you don't find any anomalies, go ahead to go up one floor.

If you make a mistake you will start again from floor 0.

Your objective is to exit via exit 8.

move using the wasd keys
You will find various options such as volume, mouse sensitivity and several graphics options in the "ESC" menu.

name: Valor of Battle
description: RPG RTS Active auto battler where you control your units of different classes, grow your army to defeat the oppressive Draken Empire. Cast spells in battle, strengthen your army with perks, upgrade items and enchant them with the power of the elements.

name: Goblin Hotdogs
description: Goblin Hotdogs is a cute and casual 3D Puzzle/Platformer. Explore, solve the mysteries of the universe, and collect the ultimate prize (hotdogs).

name: Dysarmia
description: An intergalactic RPG full of love and animals.

name: Pin Zhi
description: Meet Pin Zhi, Bhutan's journey towards the game industry. Pin Zhi tells the story about 7 individuals who wants to show the world the beauty of Bhutan. Join Pema, a young, brave and compassionate individual in a journey to recover the lost magical harmonious friends.

name: Predictile
description: Predictile" is a unique twin-stick shooting game where the trajectory of enemy attacks is displayed. Overcome waves of randomly placed enemies using skill and the power of prediction lines.

name: Sus Virus Amogus
description: Sus Virus Amogus is a sci-fi action-roguelike game. A lost scientist on an endless space station battles hostile soldiers and robots, using random weapons with unique effects to progress deeper into the station.

name: Space Gray X
description: Space Gray X is a side-scrolling bullet-hell action game where you battle alien invaders, starting from Earth and advancing into space, unlocking advanced aircraft to aid your mission.

name: Magic City Detective: The Carnival Begins - Collector's Edition
description: The clouds are gathering, and an evil spirit threatens the delicate balance. Only you can protect the secrets of the Others and resist the forces of evil!

name: Pixel Golf Club
description: Pixel Golf Club is an arcade pixel golf game that lets you unwind in a delightful world of grand golfing greens. Unleash your potential, aiming for precision and speed across endless lush landscapes.

name: Penguin's Road
description: Penguin's Road is a fast and fun 3rd-person action shooter. The player is given an arsenal of weapons and tools to defeat enemies that attack from the land, the sea and the air. The game rewards improvisation: run-and-gun, cover-to-cover, long aim, short blast, hand-to-hand or commandeering tanks!

name: Multiplayer Wizards
description: Multiplayer Wizards - Bad Dudes are attacking the magic school. You and Your wizard student friends must take out ALL Evil creatures and Save the day.

name: Demon Slayer
description: Demon Slayer - Set in the year 2075, when dark demons have invaded the world and threaten all of humanity. You will play the role of the leader of a group of killers, whose goal is to destroy demons and collect their analyzes to ensure the survival of humanity.

name: Pacification Light
description: Pacification Light is an exciting 2D platformer that takes us back to a time when spirits and ghosts inhabited our world. During this period, there lived a brave hero who decided to confront the darkness and cleanse the earth of sinister supernatural entities.

name: The Ultimate Math Teaching Game
description: A Math game combined with a futuristic 3D gaming experience that will teach you Algebra, Geometry, and Trigonometry. You will properly understand these concepts and solidify them by solving practical problems. Start your science and engineering career with this game!

name: The End of You
description: The End of You is a short, emotional narrative game about love lost, the ghosts of the past, and the painful crawl towards closure.

name: Ylands: Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Adventure awaits you in the world of Ylands! Set sail to explore, gather resources, craft tools and build anything.

name: Androsystem Idle
description: Produce Androids and create a Fleet that will help you conquer new planets. Mine valuable minerals that will further increase your production capacity.

name: Meow Moments: Olympicats
description: Join the Olympicats in Meow Moments: Celebrating Together! Celebrate sportsmanship and unity with cats and characters from around the world. Enjoy diverse sports, peaceful competition, and the joy of friendly games.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Tromsø
description: With Tromsø XP, Jo Erlend Sund and Stairport Sceneries have created another beautiful Norwegian airport scenery for X-Plane. This scenery depicts an extremely detailed recreation of Tromsø Airport on the island Tromsøya as well as its surroundings.

name: Erocism
description: In order to exorcise them full of vagina, they have to be purified with the main character's energy. Please find clues to help drive out the ghosts from their bodies!

name: Beaked Buccaneer
description: Beaked Buccaneer is a 2D mini metroidvania full of treasures and pirates that tells the story of a parrot who wants to become a pirate legend!

name: 100 Hidden Cthulhu Fish
description: 100 hidden Cthulhu fish is a hidden objects, point and click and clicker game. There are 100 fish hiding on each map. Your task is to find them all

name: Feet Paradise
description: What is a paradise for the feet? It's when your feet are tender and gentle, when your feet are kissed and just admired. This is exactly Feet Paradise!

name: DarkStar One: Nintendo Switch Edition
description:
Commander, welcome aboard the DarkStar One – Nintendo Switch Edition to be released on June 20, 2024

Breach the final frontier and explore the vast expanse of this retro space opera.

name: Word Turtle Island
description: Word Turtle Island is a nature dungeon action shooter where you use words as weapons to rescue books and readers in danger from creatures destroying the most powerful library in the galaxy. After battle, help the books and readers get where they need to be in your book sanctuary home base.

name: Metaphysical Abyss
description: Metaphysical Abyss is a philosophical game about the journey of a philosopher trying to seek the truth in an abyss full of puzzles and strange people.

name: SCP: Hours to Go
description: SCP: Hours to Go is a survival horror escape room game based on the SCP Foundation Wiki. A catastrophic event shuts down the facility, leaving you alone in the security room. Solve puzzles and contain loose SCPs to escape, or survive for as long as possible for a high score.

name: Haunt N Seek: Silent Siren
description: Atmospheric Survival / Psycholiogical horror with online escape rooms & more Other Mini-Games included in-game. Mini Sticks Air Hockey Arrow Darts Chess Pool Foosball & more

name: Rebellion Against Rebellion
description: Dive into the indie MMORPG, Rebellion Against Rebellion! Embark on a magical journey in a world of enchantment, shaped by mystical crystals. Acquire magical abilities, collect characters, and pets on epic adventures! Join now for an uplifting, enchanting experience!
